result.eng: Is there mobile phone signal here?
result.ga: An bhfuil comhartha anseo don ghuthán póca
result.orig: An bhfuil comhartha anseo don ghuthán póca
result.html: An bhfuil comhartha anseo don ghuthán pócaIs there mobile phone signal here?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil coṁarṫa anseo don ġuṫán pócaIs there mobile phone signal here?

result.html: Chuir na comharthaí mearbhall ormThe signs confused me.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir na coṁarṫaí mearḃall ormThe signs confused me.

result.eng: This area has no TV signal.
result.ga: Níl aon chomhartha teilifíse sa cheantar seo
result.orig: Níl aon chomhartha teilifíse sa cheantar seo
result.html: Níl aon chomhartha teilifíse sa cheantar seoThis area has no TV signal.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon ċoṁarṫa teilifíse sa ċeantar seoThis area has no TV signal.

result.eng: Here's a box of chocolates as a sign of thanks.
result.ga: Seo chugat bosca seacláide mar chomhartha buíochais
result.orig: Seo chugat bosca seacláide mar chomhartha buíochais
result.html: Seo chugat bosca seacláide mar chomhartha buíochaisHere's a box of chocolates as a sign of thanks.
result.ponchtml: Seo ċugat bosca seacláide mar ċoṁarṫa buíoċaisHere's a box of chocolates as a sign of thanks.

result.eng: I've put the text in quotation marks.
result.ga: Tá an téacs curtha i gcomharthaí athfhriotail agam
result.orig: Tá an téacs curtha i gcomharthaí athfhriotail agam
result.html: Tá an téacs curtha i gcomharthaí athfhriotail agamI've put the text in quotation marks.
result.ponchtml: Tá an téacs curṫa i gcoṁarṫaí aṫḟriotail agamI've put the text in quotation marks.
